title: Joel McHale
description:
NEW: Kevin Hart is joined by comedian, actor, and TV host Joel McHale. The two discuss Joel's twelve year run as host of The Soup, working with legendary actors like Chevy Chase and Jack Black, moving from Seattle to Los Angeles to work in entertainment, and growing up with dyslexia.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Joel McHale)
